00017 // Desc: Initialize Direct3D
00018 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 Result Direct3D::Init(const StartupSettings* settings)
00020 {
00021         Result rlt;
00022 
00023         d3d = this;
00024 
00025         CHKRESULT(InitDerived(settings));
00026         for(int i = 0; i < settings->numoutputs; i++)
00027         {
00028                 CHKRESULT(CreateOutputWindow(&settings->outputsettings[i], 0));
00029                 devicelost.push_back(false);
00030         }
00031 
00032         return R_OK;
00033 }
00034 
00035 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 // Name: Render()
00037 // Desc: Call Render() for every output window
00038 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 Result Direct3D::Render()
00040 {
00041         std::list<bool>::iterator devicelost_itr = devicelost.begin();
00042         Result rlt;
00043 
00044         for(int i = 0; i < numwnds; i++, devicelost_itr++)
00045         {
00046                 (*cptrwnds)[i]->Update(); // Update device
00047 
00048                 if(*devicelost_itr)
00049                         *devicelost_itr = !(*cptrwnds)[i]->Idle(); // Idle device
00050                 else
00051                         IFFAILED((*cptrwnds)[i]->Render()) // Render device
00052                         {
00053                                 if(rlt == Error(D3DERR_DEVICELOST))
00054                                         (*devicelost_itr) = true;
00055                                 else
00056                                         return rlt;
00057                         }
00058         }
00059 
00060         return R_OK;
00061 }

00063 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 // Name: TakeScreenShot()
00065 // Desc: Take screenshots on every output window
00066 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 void Direct3D::TakeScreenShot(FilePath filename, D3DX_IMAGE_FILEFORMAT fileformat)
00068 {
00069         FilePath subfilename;
00070 
00071         for(int i = 0; i < numwnds; i++)
00072         {
00073                 filename.AddSuffix(String('_') << String(i), &subfilename);
00074                 (*cptrwnds)[i]->TakeScreenShot(subfilename, fileformat);
00075         }
00076 }
